page.title: 19Summary.
page.content: There can be little doubt that Wednesbury, Darlaston, Tipton has suffered a downturn in recent years. Many thousands of jobs have gone from this block and unemployment levels are high. Many young people now talk about having to leave the area although most say they dont want to. There is still a pride in being a Black Country person which even young people still speak of. Some people stay optimistic and say that with the large number of skilled people available this area will be able to meet the needs of a changing world and be succesful again.
